Reviews.Title: Nice fort the price!
Reviews.Author: Katherine Lester
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price! I love the picture and ease of operation. Very lightweight for ease of moving and mounting on wall. Easy to assemble stand. Remote and setup were a breeze and makes a great computer monitor or slideshow for digital pictures. Would recommend as long as it keep working for the next few years.

Reviews.Title: Adequate
Reviews.Author: Michael Shreve "Mike Shreve"
Reviews.Content: PRO:  Plenty of HDMI connections for my needs.  AV and a VGA connection as well.  Light and easy to handle.  Responsive enough for most gaming uses.CON:  Decent, but not outstanding, sound and picture quality.  Slightly undersized screen.CONCLUSION:  WELL worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: This TV is a great value for the money. Cant get any better than this.
Reviews.Author: Coolhandbane
Reviews.Content: I bought this last week for 289.99. I was searching for a new 40 inch 1080p tv to replace my 32 inch 720p tv. Out of the box, the tv is light weight for the tv its size. You have to assemble the stand via screws. You are given a screw driver to use to put the stand. After setting up the TV to my verizon HD box using a HDMI cable, the picture turned out better than I expected. It is amazing how good the picture quality is, especially for the price i paid. The connections are an A+. 3 HDMIs, Composite, VGA, USB, headphone, and analog audio (RCA yellow/red cable for stereo). The colors are vivid and the picture quality is crisp.The shipping was A+ very fast. The TV gets 5 stars for the price. I paid $400 for another 3rd party TV when it was on sale (down from 500). This deal was a steal for $289.99.The only con is the Speakers/audio system within the TV. I have a stereo system hooked up and it makes a difference.

Reviews.Title: Full 1080 p  Sceptre 40" Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Quad
Reviews.Content: This was special deal when we purchased, sold for under $300 with free shipping. It has all you need in regard to hookups. But you will need a WD Live TV bon or a similar top box or you can use your computer; with this big TV screen. We have had no problems with this big screen TV; and we download movies from Netflix and Hulu and watch; plus the evening news daily. This is a good first or second large screen TV and you can't beat the price or the free shipping (it this is still being offered?) It also has less weigh than other 40"inch TV; and as mentioned; less than half the cost of our other 40" Large screen TV. Sceptre has an easy to use online support site and will give a good welcome; whenever you visit to register your TV.

Reviews.Title: This TV set came as described.
Reviews.Author: r piper
Reviews.Content: I really have enjoyed this TV set and it came to me without any problems and was easy to set up. The instructions that came with it were right on.  I found that Amazon Warehouse was a very good choice which this was my first purchase from them.  Keep up the good work.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 39-inch
Reviews.Author: Valerie A Birden
Reviews.Content: This one is in the livingroom and the other that I have is in the bedroom (another model) but I love them both, this newer model has the remote that I am also able to control my sound bars that I have purchased.

Reviews.Title: It's a great TV
Reviews.Author: Lizzy Austin
Reviews.Content: We got this during black friday for a steal of a deal.  We have it mounted on the wall in our bedroom.  Other reviewers say that sound is an issue for them.  We usually keep the volume around 15-20 which is plenty loud (it goes up to 100). I noticed that the sound comes out of the bottom and towards the back of the TV a bit.  Seems a little strange but the sound travels fine if you wall mount it.  If you have it sitting on a stand, I could see where it might get muted, hence some reviewers complaints.  Picture is wonderful.  Couldn't be happier.  And for the price we paid, couldn't be more ecstatic.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Wayne Taylor
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this television to  a friend. My kids like it. Prior,I had an old dinosaur, so we are enjoying the upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Cameron Loushin
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv shortly before Christmas for my bedroom and it works beautifully.  I had seen people on here complaining about the sound, though I haven't noticed anything out of the ordinary (make sure you do go in to the menus and disable surround sound though).  Also the ability to filter out channels you never use is fantastic.There is no noticeable input delay from the Xbox 360, PS3, or even NES, and the tv also works as a monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: JJ "JJ"
Reviews.Content: The sound is of poor quality but for the price it is a good (not great) deal. Picture quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: sceptre tv
Reviews.Author: Patrick H. Elcan Jr.
Reviews.Content: Low price TV, but looks much better.  Assembly took 4 screws, intstructions were clear and concise.  Standard settings needed adjusting for sound, picure, etc. but that was very easy to do.  So far, I am extremely happy with the purchase.  Shipping was extremely fast, no problems with the product.  Only time will tell, but as of today it is 5*.

Reviews.Title: Very fine TV, with some limitations.
Reviews.Author: Martin J. Hnetynka
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a Sceptre 32 inch LCD TV, which I returned since it had very poor audio quality.  This 39" set has tinny audio as well, but the earphone jack is clean enough to drive an amplifier.  Otherwise, the TV displays  beautiful images, performs very well and has a great variety of I/O ports.  It is a great item, especially for the low price.  Sceptre did a good job on this one.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Starleen Benke "CYT addict"
Reviews.Content: Easy set up, good picture, and Mounted to the wall with relative ease. I was able to enjoy it the same day I got it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Dr. Kitties "janelle17_2000"
Reviews.Content: I don't have any issues with this TV at all. I was skeptical about the brand since I had never heard of it, but I am pleased, and you can't beat the price. I have the TV in my sitting area, and it looks good there. You'll have to toy with the sound and picture settings a bit because at first the picture was darker than normal and the sound was weak, but once I adjusted it, no problem. I do not feel the need for speakers, but the room I have it in is not huge and the sound travels well in it. Good picture too.

Reviews.Title: great tv!
Reviews.Author: cbg
Reviews.Content: the TV stand was crooked and took a while to fix upon set up, but other than that it's great!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Toni Riggs
Reviews.Content: This television was a lot cheaper than most and has an excellent picture.  I have never heard of the brand name and got it for an extra room in the house.  The quality is better than our popular brand television hanging in the living room.  I can't figure out how to remove the cylinder that was connected to the base though.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Christina M. Williams
Reviews.Content: This TV is such a great buy.  I have another Flat Screen that is a Sharp and this TV looks just as good and a really good price.  The color is good, and even the sound comes out good not "hollow" sounding.  It was cute because it comes with its own screwdriver to attach the stand to it.  That was extremely convenient.

Reviews.Title: For the price
Reviews.Author: Bethany Ernsdorff
Reviews.Content: My one main problem with this tv is the sound is awful.  It's tinny and hollow.  However, with that said this tv has enough ports that if you wanted you could hook up external speakers, which I did, and the sound is than perfect.  One other minor issue I have discovered is that it is somewhat slow when changeing channels.  A little aggravting and if I could give half a star this rating would actually be 3 1/2 due to this issue.However, overall this tv was what I expected.  It has a great picutre, swivels (which is a plus for me!), it's easy to setup and the settings are easy to figure out.  So far I am extremely pleased I bought this tv.

Reviews.Title: Not what we're used to, but okay for the price
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: We have an larger, much more expensive Vizio in our living room so it isn't terribly fair to compare this television to what we are used to. I bought this one for our bedroom. Picture quality is decent enough, but the sound is a bit lacking. I'll likely purchase a sound bar at some point and use it rather than the build in speakers. Overall I'm content.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Kevin Malone
Reviews.Content: Got this one for $299 which is crazy for a 40" LCD HDTV.  Set up was very simple and picture quality is great!  I ordered a Sceptre sound bar for $35.00 and I love the set up.  For what I paid this is exceeding my expectations.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Leonard Kleuser
Reviews.Content: no complaints other then it has no digital sound hookup. very good deal for two hundred and fifty bucks. probably will be buying my mom one.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with Scepter
Reviews.Author: Wayne Dementi
Reviews.Content: Sceptre X408BV-FHD 39-Inch 1080p 60HZ LCD HDTV (Black) .  Excellent quality.  Love its size.  Great picture.  Great price. Fits well in space.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for a 40" TV
Reviews.Author: cpqal
Reviews.Content: Any review based on only a few weeks of use is of questionable value but so far we are very pleased with this purchase. Ours was for use in a bedroom so it gets only light use and that was why I was also willing to take a chance with an off brand. I had first purchased a 32" TV at SAM's but then discovered this 40" Sceptre on Amazon for about a net $20 difference. Bigger is always better when it comes to TV size. The Sceptre is not a "Smart" TV but I don't see that as much of a deterrent. I feel that issue is better handled by the use of a Roku or other more complete separate device than built in features that don't handle input from all providers. The features on the Sceptre are pretty extensive with multiple HDMI ports and a lot of controls on the Remote. Overall I will say that it feels like it is perhaps not quite as "refined" as the Samsungs that I have but then it also sells for a much more attractive price for the size. The only thing I truly find to be slightly annoying with this TV is that for some reason they felt the need to momentarily show the name "Sceptre" on the screen every time the unit is first turned on. Why anyone at the company didn't perceive that the repetitive nature of this would not be annoyng is puzzling but it is not a major issue. As long as this TV works problem free over time I will be happy. Complaints about sound or picture quality are very user expectation dependent. I found I did need to play with the settings to find levels that I found acceptable but I certainly was able to adjust it to something I found reasonable. It is very difficult if nearly impossible for a TV to be as flat as an LED and still contain speakers that can deliver great sound. If you are very particular then you will likely need to add a soundbar. For a bedroom though I found I could adjust the settings to something I could easily live with.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre tv
Reviews.Author: Mary McFarland
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tv is great.  I gave it a four star rating because of the sound.  I will buy a sound bar to compensate for the terrible sound this tv provides.Other than the sound, it is a great tv.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: a fine Tv worth owning
Reviews.Author: Nduku8
Reviews.Content: This is the best picture. Showing brilliance in colors and being easy to work, I think this tv is probably the best one on the market for the price. the Hi definition is totally awesome and works well with all systems i use with it (wii, ps3, and xbox 360).the ONLY DOWNFALL is that the SOUND SUCKS. the speakers are weak and crappy. But it's way cheaper to buy some sound system or something for the tv than buying a more expensive tv that everyone is going to use their own speaker system on anyway.

Reviews.Title: Tough to beat
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I'm on a pretty tight budget, so I am weary to purchase off brand items in fear that it may not function as advertized. After purchasing this tv I am very happy to recommend it to someone looking for an entry level hdtv. Works as advertised and the picture is crisp and clean.

Reviews.Title: good picture, fast delivery,good price, the only thing wrong is the sound
Reviews.Author: Gary F. Garner
Reviews.Content: has a great picture, great tv except the sound, it is very tinny and you can't adjust it enough, you will have to get external sound,but it is still a great value for the money...

Reviews.Title: Not the best sound
Reviews.Author: Rae
Reviews.Content: For my house this TV is great. The picture quality is awesome, but the sound quality isn't. Since I have a separate surround sound system and don't use the TV's volume at all, it doesn't affect me, however other consumers would probably care to know.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: tlja
Reviews.Content: I don't pretend to know much about TVs but this one has everything you need for a 2nd or 3rd TV in a bedroom or den. You can't touch a 40" 1080i for this price. Others are correct, the sound is not the best. But for $289.00??!!!!Updated after a month of use. The speaker is really bad. I bought a cheap surround sound to fix. Removed one star. Picture and all other features are great.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Dan Devine
Reviews.Content: This was a huge upgrade for us. Kinda an off brand, but this is a great unit! I read the reviews and for $250 I scored!!! Thanx Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great value television.
Reviews.Author: Carl Gussgard "cgussgard"
Reviews.Content: Used primarily for video games.  Works great. Clear picture.  May want to use a soundbar for better audio. Great value.

Reviews.Title: Damn Good For The Money!
Reviews.Author: Chris Polzin
Reviews.Content: I'm veeeeery frugal. That's half the reason it's taken me this long to step up to a nice flat screen tv instead of some piece of junk I found at Goodwill. That said the $250 I paid for it at the time is more than worth it!Pros!-Bright Beautiful Picture-Plenty of inputs for your various needs-Great Price rangeCons!-The audio is so-so. I'm planing on nabbing a surround sound system in the near future but it's fine for the timeJust make sure you set your own equalizer settings.-The remote downright sucks. Get a new one.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jerry Asher "Jerry Asher"
Reviews.Content: December 14, 2012 Nice and big, great picture. Use it with a HDMI cable and adjust the resolution on the T.V. and cable box menus. And voila awesome picture! January 26, 2013 So I've read alot of new comments lately and they say the sound quality is poor. News flash you paid 288 for this t.v. you are not getting theater surround sound. And if you can't figure out how to adjust the sound settings on a t.v. then don't buy it. Buy a more expensive one that does everything for you. This is a dumb t.v. not a smart t.v. LOL! I have found several times adjusting the sound settings to get it where i wanted it.P.S. Bought a wall mount for 15 bucks and it looks sharp! The wall mount was easier than i thought it would be too. If i would of used a stud finder it would of been even easier:)

Reviews.Title: Nice TV...great image!
Reviews.Author: Nerlande Cassamajor
Reviews.Content: This was an early christmas gift from my boyfriend.  I read all the reviews and it was within his price range so he bought it.  Thanks to the other reviewers who talked about the audio quality I knew what to expect, and yes the sound is bad.!  However, I plugged it into my stereo system and bam...It sounds great!  The picture is crisp and beautiful.  I wish I could say more but this is my first flat screen so I reallly can't compare.  Shipping was really fast and set up was even faster. My son and I were blown away when we hooked up the Wii.  It's a completely different experience than using our old 32" tube TV.  I guess you don't know what you're missing until you actually use it!

Reviews.Title: Super Light and Beautiful HD Picture
Reviews.Author: George Tr
Reviews.Content: Rated this highly because the quality apart from sound is excellent. Price is right down there with very affordable and setup was so easy even a cave wo/man can do it well. Definitely recommend as affordable and excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre X408BV-FHD 39-Inch 1080p 60HZ LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Spencer
Reviews.Content: Pro's:- Was cheaper than the 32-in Sceptre at the time- Came fast and with no damages (plus a screwdriver for set up)- Awesome size for college dorm room- 3 HDMI's- Looks sleek and not cheap  like some other cheaper brands- HDMI quality for video games and movies is greatCon's:- Analog channels are fuzzy/noisy (GET HD CHANNELS FOR THIS TV)- Picture could be crisper and more fluid. I have a 50" Philips 1080p HDTV for $700 and the quality is slightly better for both TV and movie watching-Tweaking of contrast/brightness/color etc needed..:Overall Summary:.If you want a cheaper 1080p HDTV but aren't a perfectionist about the crisp/fluid diagonal lines or text being breath-takingly clear, then I'd suggest this TV.HD channels, Netflix, Xbox 360(hdmi), and PC connecting(hdmi) all look great, but when things aren't in HD, the overall quality of the TV goes down a bunch. I'd suggest a big brand and bigger size for a living room, but this size and model are great for medium sized rooms/dorms/bedrooms/etc.AGAIN, invest in HD channels as well as HDMI cables if you're connecting computers or video game consoles to get the most out of this TV!

Reviews.Title: Got it to replace a 36" on the wall - didn't like it - put the 36" back!
Reviews.Author: Tanzanite Gal "Denise"
Reviews.Content: And, it was my fault as to why I put the 36" back where it was and put this on the stand on a shelf in the dining room where it works out just fine.I read the reviews on Amazon and WMart and this tv was consistently higher than some others so I bought it thinking 40" would be great in the living room.  It was to replace a 36" Honeywell bought from a shopping network (I know - never again)4 years ago which works great - I just wanted a larger tv.  Duh...I should have done a LOT more research than just read reviews.For one thing, this tv is smaller than the 36" in overall appearance.  I just didn't like it on the wall and couldn't get used to the smaller size and then I realized I did have a larger picture screen with the 36".  I changed the Aspect from Zoom to Cinema to Standard on the Sceptre and did not like any of them - not for what I wanted.So, down it came and back up went the Honeywell.The Sceptre tv itself is a nice looking tv.  The sound is a bit off, but since I am not doing anything with it other than watching movies/primetime it is okay.  I am having to get used to it and am still wishing I had gotten a larger screen.  Now all that is just me.  For the price, I think it is a great purchase.  The picture is clear. There is really nothing to dislike about it.  A remote with a light would have been nice though.I also bought a Haier L32A2120 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV for the bedroom and prefer the look/picture/sound to that of the Sceptre.I think my review would be to point out to not just buy something based on what you think you are reading rather than to sit down and pay attention to exactly 'what' you are reading and do comparisons which I did not.  It was an impulse buy. And, the positive reviews will probably all be 'spot on'and the tv will outlast me and I'll never get a bigger screen!  :)

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Bleak
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first of purchasing a Sceptre LCD as I wasn't very familiar with the company so I did some research on who Sceptre were and how customer's feel about them. The reviews were a mixed bag with most being positive actually, you can't always trust everything negative you read, sometimes you just have to pull the trigger and not look back. I have to say, I'm glad I did. The display, like most others will point out. Is just incredible for a TV of this price. The speakers are lousy but thankfully there is a Audio In on the side of the TV which allowed me to hook up my computer speakers with subwoofer for a huge improvement. The stand is somewhat wobbly but not enough to where you fear the TV falling forward or backward just fasten it tight. The width of the TV I would say is midsized, though far from being the thinnest LCD on the market but definitely not the thickest either. Games look gorgeous on my PS3. I just bought this set so it's durability and longevity is still to be determined but if you're looking for a budget LCD that will give you a huge bang for your buck then look no further than the Sceptre 40 class.PROS :Awesome picture quality for it's class.Affordable.Comes with it's own microfiber cloth and screwdriver. (Oh, the little things...)Not exactly sleek but stylish.3 x HDMIAudio InUSB for Android Sticks or boxes.CONS :Crummy speakers.Wobbly mount.Generic looking remote. (The only time I use it is to switch inputs most of the time anyways.)No DVI input.*Update February 2, 2013*Still rocking hard with this TV and as happy as day one. I have multiple things hooked up to this TV, including both of my laptops, Wii, PS3, speakers, Digital Antenna. There is soo much to choose from I rarely use it as a conventional television. It just has inputs for everything. I feel like I need a dedicated smart blue ray player at this point to truely appreciate visual quality. I watched Avatar on my PS3 hooked up on HDMI and although it was incredible and a great first look at your new unit I know it can do more. I checked the unit's speaker quality again to see if I felt the same about them as initially and I concur with my original review, they don't have any bite to them... It's not enough of a gripe to lower it from 5 stars. We are talking about 39" of beautiful display at a very affordable cost. With those things in mind the incredible amount of inputs from VGA, to 3xHDMI to Audio in analog, to audio out plus more you have almost everything you need. What more can you ask for at such prices? Probably a DVI input.*Update May 28, 2013*This may be my final update unless something goes tragically wrong in the future. I have no buyer's remorse at this time. I'm considering purchasing one of Sceptre's larger sets - I'm just that happy with this one.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Halo
Reviews.Content: Look, this is a $500 TV I got for $250.  Bring only your $500 expectations because compared to a Sony or the LG TV in our den we purchased for $1000, this TV will lack.  The sound IS tinny at times, otherwise the image is great!  BTW you can adjust the audio and it even comes with granular adjustments like an EQ.  3 HDMI ports.  This TV is awesome for my office.  Would be perfect for a den, apartment or even an apartment.  Great TV for the price!  If you want the most awesome audio and video, be prepared to spend $1000 or more (at least $800).  Highly recommended for the price!!  Deducted 1 star because it's just not a "5 star" TV, but if I could give it 4.5 stars I would.

Reviews.Title: Sharp, crisp, clear picture
Reviews.Author: C M K Patrick
Reviews.Content: 40" (actually 39") will be great for watching your DVD movies and Blu-Ray discs...1080 High Definition internal analog and digital tuning for local station broadcasts or from your cable or satelite converter box,though their is a fuzzy issue with my Playstation 2, maybe I should have gone with the 32"...or buy a Nintendo Wii.

Reviews.Title: perfect.
Reviews.Author: kedricflemius
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is good. sound is okay. i bought this to play my video games and it works perfectly. not to big not too small

Reviews.Title: Excellent Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Hailey Shopper
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV to stream content from Roku and Apple TV devices; I don't have cable or another opportunity for live programming.  I couldn't be happier with this product (X409BV-FHD).  As other reviews have noted, the sound quality from the TV is not great, but I route all my audio through my home theatre.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Minor issues
Reviews.Author: Lance Bell
Reviews.Content: Purchased the TV about 2.5 months ago when I was needing to replace the one stolen from me.  This had the right specs and was at a great price at the time.  Today I can't really complain about it.  The viewing angle has something to be desired, but the resolution, black clarity, and color vibrance on this set was spot on the money.  The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is due to the fact that it has some "flashlighting" down in the bottom right corner, which is a problem when viewing something rather dark.  Otherwise, I highly recommend this tv to others needing a good sized set with full 1080p reso that happen to be on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Television
Reviews.Author: Corey B.
Reviews.Content: While I'm not an HDTV connoisseur and I don't fully understand all the technical jargon, I can say that I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase.  The picture is great.  The price on Amazon was even better.  I did have to change the Audio setting from the default "surround sound" as it sounded muffled, but now the audio works great as well.

Reviews.Title: We Are Surprised
Reviews.Author: Tom Illinois
Reviews.Content: We have only had this TV for 2 days now but I will tell you what I know.  First, realizing that Tv's are quickly becoming throw away items, we did not want to invest in any high cost items.  We determined we did not care about the name on the set and we were going to look at cost first and then do all of the investigation we could via reviews on Amazon as well as other sites.  We ended up focusing on this set primarily cause it would fit in our existing armoire.  Most reviews reflected a great picture but terrible sound.  We did not care about sound as we have surround.  Some folks talked about inferior plastic construction, all tv's that I see are plastic. Some talked about how wobbly the stand is but since this was going in a cabinet we did not concern ourselves with it.The television arrived in 2 days via prime.  I already had the old set removed and my home theater ready to hook up.  Set up was easy and quick as we had it turned on within 30-40 minutes.  Part of set-up now days is getting a universal remote to work and many of the reviews had difficulty finding Sceptre remote codes.  Right in the manual that comes with a Tv it stated to use Sony codes.  In fact my old tv was a sony and my satellite remote worked on this set immediately as the code is what I had previously.The picture is very good, better than the Sony that we had. It was pretty close right out of the box but I have ultimately changed the settings to my own liking.  We can't tell you anything about the sound as we immediately turned it off to use our own sound system.  I don't like the sound of any tv with stand alone sound. Watched nfl footbal first evening and there were no issues with motion at all.  One thing I would like to pass on is it is really wobbly. When pushing the cabinet back to the wall it wobbled all over.  There is a screw hole in the back of the base where you can fasten it down to keep it from tipping over if you like.  The reason it is not stiff is because of the swivel ability, they might consider doing away with that feature.  One other tip for you is to turn the sharpness setting up fairly high.  We also have a larger Hitachi in our home that I love but had to turn sharpness up on that as well.Hope this information is useful to those of you that are doing what we just ended doing in investigating a purchase.  After a couple of days can't tell you how long it will last but if I get a couple of years it will still be a good value.  Good Luck and Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Gori Suture "Author of Asphyxia"
Reviews.Content: Picked out according to customer reviews on various sites and decided it was worth the risk.If it holds up overtime I will be well satisfied.Picture quality is excellent, speakers are ok would probably be a better choice for those who have a decent surround setup already.Feature set is nice and controls and remote are easy and well thought out and seem solid.Other reviews complaining about the stand are fairly accurate as the default one is pretty cheap though not really awful or bad.Overall a great value for the money and I consider myself pretty picky on image quality.

Reviews.Title: Great-especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer P
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this. There are more than enough inputs for us. We are also glad to we able to connect our speakers to it. The product does not have the greatest speakers. It is what one would expect though. There are no problems with it at all for us. It is also nice and lightweight, and easy to move if necessary.

Reviews.Content: Everything arrived with it and setup was fairly easy, but the remote is terrible and hardly works and the in-tv speakers are absolutely terrible.  the TV itself worked fine for all of 4-5 weeks before the picture started blacking out periodically for a few seconds each time. I spent $50 (USD) and its great for what I needed it to be.In conclusion, if you are on a budget, get this tv. Hihgly recommended.

Reviews.Title: HDMI Inputs Defective
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Tobacco "Richard"
Reviews.Content: Several months after purchase, I got around to attaching a DVD player.  Although the DVD player is known to be operational all HDMI inputs indicated "no signal".  I attached the DVD via the YPbPr.. cables, after less than an hour of operation this input also failed ("no signal").Four business days after contacting Sceptre and leaving a phone mail message, I have yet to get a return phone call.Update: I have since submitted an email RMA request and gotten a response, but no RMA.I will be responsible for packaging and shipping charges cross country.[Update 6/11/13] Sceptre has provided an RMA and stated that they would send a technician to my home to verify the problem!  Once verified the tech would return with the necessary replacement parts.  This is a great solution, IF someone will contact me - it has been six days....{Update 6/23/13] Made contact with service last week.  After explaining my trouble-shooting, they agreed to send a new circuit board directly to me. A lot of screws to remove, but now all is working well.  Thank you Sceptre - I did not have to ship the TV and the delay of a technician coming to the house was avoided.

Despite this TV being an off-brand, on sale, and shipped for free, the television, shipping, and customer service was great. So far, I have used the TV for a month now and all is well. Reviews.Content: Bought two of these fine units. One for the workout room and another for my bedroom. They do what they were meant to do and I would recommend this HDTV to others.

Reviews.Title: Happy with it.

Reviews.Content: Crisp, clear color and a great size for an apartment or small house.  For the price, this TV was well worth it.  I live in a small townhouse and this is my main TV.  It not too large that it fit well on my smaller TV stand.  Had it for 3 months and never had an issue with it.

Reviews.Title: Ideal bedroom/den TV
Reviews.Author: D. Limbach "Gadget Guy, Digital Media Produce...
Reviews.Content: Want to have the news on while getting ready for work in the morning? Watch a movie snug in your bed? Don't want to spend much on a bedroom TV? Here's a great TV for the money. Also fits the bill for a sunroom, den, or workout room. You will be hard-pressed to find any other 1080p TVs with these specs for this price.I've owned this TV for about 18 months, and it's been nothing short of outstanding. Picture is excellent. Accommodates my cable box(1080i), Blu-ray player(1080p), laptop(1080p), and a set of external 2.1 (sub-satellite) speakers for rich sound.The only downside is the TV's audio is not very impressive, thus the external speakers (connected to the TV's headphone-put jack, so they work with anything I am sending to the TV (cable, Blu-ray, or laptop).For a very reasonable price, you won't regret this unit, and you'll appreciate the huge savings over Sony, LG, Samsung, etc.

Reviews.Title: Died for no reason at all...
Reviews.Author: Jacob M. Moyles "Gamer"
Reviews.Content: Bought the tv and received no power cord in the box. The tv then only lasted about 5 months until it just stopped working one night. Huge disappointment! Sound quality was quite poor as well.

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny (And Pixel)!
Reviews.Author: Joshua T. Ebert "Ebes"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful and amazing TV. We got it for my dad, and it's been everything we needed. He wasn't looking for something "huge," and he's not the type that's a audio- or videophile, so he didn't need something super premium. This TV really impressed me though, and has seemed like an exceptional "low-end" TV. It's truly a great bang for your buck.We use it with an attached Denon audio system, so I can't speak much to the onboard audio. The few times we've used it, it's sounded fine to me. It's certainly capable of putting out expected volume at seemingly reasonable quality.In terms of picture– this is everything that is advertised. I don't feel it skimps on any pixels of quality. You get the full 1080p experience that you expect. It's a great size, and isn't overbearing in weight. We hung ours on the wall with a pivoting mount that can retract to nearly "flush" to the wall. With the low-profile "flatness" of this TV, it stays well out of the way.Would (and did) buy Sceptre again!

Reviews.Content: The base for my Sceptre X408BV-FHD TV broke and it cannot stand up by itself. This is so dumb because I will never buy another Sceptre product.

The sound is bad though, but what do you expect with tiny built in speakers that face away the wall? Get a sound bar for this and it's a perfect budget setup.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Content: Got this for around $275 over 6 months ago, use in my home office to hook up my work laptop. Reviews.Title: will never bay a Sceptre again.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Doug Miller
Reviews.Content: the only complaint is with the sound when watching sporting events.  Often times that announcers voice is washed out by the background noise of the crowd.  I have tried different sound settings but haven't been able to improve the situation.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 40" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Doitrightstein
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid I could not be happier. I use amazon prime so transit time is greatly reduced. I believe that the longer the TV is in transit the more chance for damage. I ordered 2 of these and both arrived just fine. Sound on flat TVs is often very bad, not so with these. just go into sound Eq settings and boost the 2 bass settings to taste. Kill some of the highs to your taste without affecting voice clarity. While this is fine for every TV, some sort of sound system makes movies and music far more enjoyable. In contrast my Toshiba in the living room cost 3 times more and the sound stinks. we have basic cable in the bedroom and the picture is fine to my eyes. Just a little tweaking in picture settings was necessary. HD is probably wonderful. The remote needs to be replaced with a universal that has learning function. the remote follows Sony codes but the select button will not work unless learned from the original remote.

Reviews.Title: The picture is great!

Reviews.Content: This has a beautiful picture, I agree with other reviews that the sound isn't the best but for the price it's acceptable

Reviews.Title: Great T.V
Reviews.Author: kelvin gauthier
Reviews.Content: This T.V is great for Small to Mid Size rooms. I didn't have alot of problems with the T:V like most of these reviews but i did have a problem with the stand it comes with, it kinda tilts frontwards but for the price i didn't care.

Reviews.Title: Are you kidding me? great for the price
Reviews.Author: Spencer

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS TV!

Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this TV. It was easy to get it set up, and it looks so sleek! It cuts off by itself if you forget to cut off the TV, NO WORRIES! and it is energy efficient. I just could not ask for a better deal on this TV. VERY SATISFIED!

Reviews.Title: impressed

Reviews.Title: Great Price for a Great TV!

I can't believe the quality of the picture.  It's so clear.  Channels come in so quickly and the best is the ease of the HDMI hookup.  It is also serving a a monitor for the small lap top.  Sweet!  I'm beyond pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: 4.5 Stars
Reviews.Author: BillSmash
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kids to replace two TVs (a plasma and DLP) that broke within a week of each other. The picture quality is great but the sound is awful which is the only reason I would dock it half a star.I am very happy with this TV for the low low price of $250. I am planning on purchasing another one in the next month or so.

Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Content: The TV is a good product. I guess I was expecting much from the picture quality, but, overall, I am satisfied with it. Next time, I will visit the store so I'll know what I'm buying. No fault of yours, just my poor judgment.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied!

Reviews.Content: Best TV I've ever had the pleasure owning. With full HD picture! Awesome colors and decent on board speakers, it really just seems like I'm in a movie theater when I lay down in bed. Very satisfied, and it really meshes well with my Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: K. Elkurd
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of how cheap it was, wasnt looking to put much money into a TV now. But i love the size, and it works great! the picture and sound quality are no where near the best of whats on the market nowadays, but you pay for what you get, right? No complaints, no defects, or issues. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Bobby Pitts "bob"
Reviews.Content: I have not had any issues with this tv. It is a great tv for the price. I agree with other reviews that the sound is not great however, but for the picture and the price I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great size for this price.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Morris "Cakeisalye"

Reviews.Title: Great TV (for the price)
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for about 2 months now and I am very pleased with my purchase. There is no way I could have gotten more bang for my buck on a large tv by my standards. I also purchased a ps3 to go with the tv and the games have looked amazing on the screen in HD 1080p. my only complaint and as to why I am giving it four stars is the sound. I thought people were Being  over critical but the sound quality is noticeable. I am not a very tech savy guy and thought I wouldn't notice but I can. Honestly I have already gotten used to the sound but if you are concerned about sound might consider a sound bar. Trick is to turn off stereo setting wich helps a fair amount. Also the back plate for mounting is a little funky so be careful if trying to mount this tv. Screw holes are in strange position but held up during mounting and seems to be holding very well. I bought this tv for $259.99 which was a stal if you ask me. Worth every penny highly recomend this tv for a person on a budget but wants a big tv.

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected
Reviews.Author: Buffy
Reviews.Content: We used to have a 43 inch Plasma TV made by Samsung, but unfortunately, we lost it along with several other electronics when lightning hit too closely to our house. After reading all the good reviews on both Amazon and Newegg, I decided I would take a chance on this TV. After all, you can't beat $259 for an 40 inch HDTV. It sounded like a good replacement for our old TV and at an amazing price. Well... sometimes good reviews aren't everything.When I got the TV I was surprised by how much smaller it was compared to our old one. It's not a 40 inch at all. It's more like 36"-38" (I think the box says 38.5"), depending on how you measure it, which isn't all that much bigger than our bedroom TVs. That wasn't enough to completely turn me off to it, but it was a start.The TV is easy enough to set up. We didn't have any trouble getting it on the stand. It even comes with its own screwdriver to put in the screws. We stuck it on the stand and got it plugged in, turned it on and... nothing. The red light turned over to blue but no picture. I was like, okay, what's wrong with it? We looked in the manual, and it states it may take 10-12 seconds to properly turn on. We waited well past 10-12 seconds. It was more like 4 minutes, maybe even 5. I'm not entirely sure. But it was to the point where I was thinking it was broken. I went from the living room to my computer in the bedroom, deciding to google it and see if anyone else experienced this, when I was told it FINALLY came on. Obviously this didn't look like a good sign. Why did it take THAT long to turn on?We got it set up with our HD DirecTV box easy enough. The picture was not great out of the box but with some adjusting we got it to look decently. However programming the remote was a fail. I managed to get the right code put in, but the DirecTV remote won't adjust the volume unless you hit mute first. It turns the TV on and off without problems, but forget working the volume with it. I also couldn't get the input to work, either. Despite it being something small, this was just another thing that bothered me.I just could not bring myself to like this TV. Maybe I'm just being picky but it wasn't at all what I expected it to be. I also worried that maybe something may go wrong later if it had that much trouble first turning on. Just didn't take that as a good sign. I will say the picture is pretty decent. Maybe not the best picture I've seen, but not bad. And unlike most people, I wasn't bothered by the sound. Then again, I've reviewed another TV where everyone said the sound was horrible, and I wasn't bothered then either. Maybe it's because I have a small home or maybe I just don't care that much about perfect sound. Either way, it's not bad. The TV can get pretty loud if you turn it all the way up, and I didn't hear any scratchiness or static when I had it turned up. Oh, and the one thing I DID like about this TV was the fact that it's on a swivel. You can turn it to the right or the left with ease, which is nice depending on your living room setup. It's also extremely light. One person could carry it on their own (though I wouldn't recommend that). It's not heavy it all. It isn't exactly a thin TV, though. It's a little on the bulky side. Maybe because it has so many inputs. The on/off buttons are also on the side.Overall, I'm not going to say this TV is an absolute piece of crap. For the price, I guess it's not too bad. But don't buy it expecting a high quality TV for a cheap price. It's a mediocre TV at best. I'm returning mine and getting another Samsung.

Reviews.Content: I bought this not very long ago and have used it for movies.  I like the picture although it does seem to look as though the images aren't quite focused when viewed close up.  It's still a very nice t.v. for the price though..

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about how this product would hold up as it's by far the cheapest you can get a TV of this size. However, everything about it seems pretty good so far.The TV is relatively light for it's size, and the base was easy to install, can be removed, and swivels, which is convenient.It came with batteries for the remote which is also nice.My one complaint would be the packaging felt a little sub par. The TV was well protected on the corners and had a piece of Styrofoam on the top and bottom, but the sides of the box were relatively unprotected. I probably really wouldn't have noticed this but when I received the TV there were some dents and rips in the exterior cardboard box (I suppose just damage received in transit?). I was a little worried some of these might have gone through, however, thankfully the TV was unscratched on the inside.On the whole, for the $260 I paid for this, it seems like an amazing deal. Crisp picture, no back light bleed, and decent speakers (a little tinny, but if you really care about sound output you won't be using your TV speakers). Would definitely recommend this product to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: I was relunctant to purchase a non name brand TV. I actually purchased a different non name brand flat screen Tv a few days prior to seeing this one. I went on line to check reviews for the one I purchased previously and found the reviews were not so good. So I took that one back to the store and purchased this one. It is light weight, thin and easy to handle. The stand has a pivoting action which is a bonus. I bought a great wall mount from amazon.com and used that instead. I have mine connected to an inside antenna, no cable or satelite dish. The picture is comparable to any high dollar name brand out there. The first couple days the picture did not seem very clear. After i took the time to adjust my table top antenna I have fantastic clarity and I even receive more over the air channels than I did with my old flat screen. Now my old TV was over five years old.But even new the picture was not near this clear and vivid. I am soooo glad i purchased this one. I will purchase this brand again when it comes time to get another. Less money for the max buck!

Again, you aren't going to get the sound of a Home theater system or a Bose system, but what do you expect for this price range?  With the TV mounted to my wall, I can hear it on a volume level setting of 10 (very low amount) 3 rooms away.  It provides plenty of sound and you will not have to crank it up to hear it.I can not talk about the longevity of this TV since I just got it, but if you are on the fence, I would say do it.  The picture looks great, more than what I expected for a cheaper TV like this.  (And take my word, I am a TV-phile as I have about 10 TV in my house ranging from projectors, to LED's, to basic LCDs.)  You will not be disappointed.I only gave 4 stars because personally the glossy black can cause reflection issues if near a window and I do not particularly like that the inputs are on the side of the TV not the bottom. Reviews.Title: Better than advertised
Reviews.Author: Ellen J. Gannon
Reviews.Content: Amazing value....phenomenal picture....what more can I say?  Price was so good, could not refuse, and my brother already owned the same brand, so knew it was a good value...

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Rodney
Reviews.Content: I bought this while on sale, for my office/game room. It's been a great buy. The picture quality is excellent. While the speakers do suck on this, I have a surround sound system attached to it, so that's not an issue for me.If you don't have surround sound or something else, you'll definitely want to buy a speaker bar, or something as the sound comes out sounding weird without it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv, Fast Delivery (NO DAMAGE!)
Reviews.Author: Taran W.
Reviews.Content: I bought this 40 in flat screen tv for the same amount that I paid for a 32" on Black Friday $250! Shipping was free and fast. I was so worried about making an order for something that says "minor cosmetic damage", but once my tv arrived it was obvious the only damage was to the box it was shipped in, the tv had NO DAMAGE, no defect, plugged it in and it worked fine, sound quality may not be the best of the bet but its great considering the price paid and anyone can easily buy a surround sound system if they're that picky for only $50 or so. I am so happy with my purchase, oh yes an the picture quality once in HD is perfect, however if you're going to be hooking it up w/ SD the screen quality isn't that great!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews with stand and sound quality, I almost did not purchase. The owner of our local hometown TV station recommended this unit in a 40 or 42 inch. He has several with a 100,000 to 1 contrast ratio. They are very happy with the quality and price value. I was only able to find 40" 90,000to 1 contrast ratio on Walmart on line shopping during the black friday sales for $299. They sold out before I got finished with my research on the model, as I was trying to find the 100,00 to 1 ratio. I had this unit that I purchased from Amazon in my wish list. As soon as Amazon got this TV in stock they emailed me and I ordered 2. The 1st one I have totally set up and connected all my surround and other componets by myself. I did have to purchase one cable to be able to receive my local town TV station channels from my analog outside antenna. I am electronicly challenged but for me this was a breeze. So if I can do it than everyone can. The size was a little large for me to handle but I got it put in my living room amiore with surround receiver 6.1 channel, dual cassett player, 5 disc cd player, vhs player and dvd player plus satalite tv dish reciver, all items are with electronic power strips, which with all the componets I needed 2 very high quality. My second TV same as the above was shipped so I should be receiving it this week. It will go in my bed room with just 5.1 surround system, analog, satalite, dvd player and vhs. I can't wait to have a 2 new TV's. I am not sure if this is a genric brand from Sony or Toshiba, but it is one or the other. Fantastic quality for the money. Great picture, color, sound and the stand could be stronger, but for me it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and great first HDTV
Reviews.Author: Fradubio
Reviews.Content: Aside from getting teased for getting a TV called Sceptre, it is great. I haven't had a tv in a long time and it is way better than the old Sony Triniton (big box) tv I used to have, and the laptop I've gotten used to.

Reviews.Title: Not the best TV ever, but worth the price
Reviews.Author: ShatteredCrest
Reviews.Content: I get a lot of people looking like they have sunburns, even those with very dark skin, that I can't seem to eliminate through any combination of graphics settings.  But it's not all the time and I've gotten used to it when it does happen.  Otherwise I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Awesome T.V
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: This is a great T.V for the price. The video quality is fantastic, I give it a 9/10. The sound quality isn't fantastic, but it does get loud. I will be hooking up a sound system to this in the future. Overall, I love this T.V and feel like it was a steal at this price.

Reviews.Title: TV is just OK ~ Customer Service is Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Trese Childs
Reviews.Content: Sound is really bad, I read reviews and didn't think it could be that bad. When I want to lisen to music in the kitchen or even the front room I turn on one of my bedroom TV's (which are 10 or more years old) because the sound is better than this New Sceptre TV in the front room.The TV also takes a while to turn on, change channels and adjust the volume.When it was delivered it was missing the stand and I had to call to get a stand sent out. Once I got the stand I tried to hook the TV & Cable up and found that I had no sound, I called Sceptre for two weeks with no answer and no reply to my messages. When I contacted Amazon to return the TV they were able to help me to figure out the sound problem. Thank you to Amazon, but I should have returned it anyway!I would suggest spending a little extra money and getting a better brand TV!

Reviews.Title: I'll be buying a second one soon
Reviews.Author: Rhi
Reviews.Content: This tv really is a great purchase for the price! Obviously it's no $800 LG or Vizio or whatever, but the sound and picture quality on it are great! I'm already planning my second purchase for another room in the house. I would definitely recommend this TV if you're looking for something nice but not too pricey.

Reviews.Title: So far so Good
Reviews.Author: Stephen Franco
Reviews.Content: For the price this Tv is excellent. The picture is really good. I was worried about the sound but for those complaining are just expecting WAY too much. The sound is good and gets fairly loud but it lacks any base and is fairly shallow (reminds me of the old CRT tvs). To be honest the sound seems fairly normal to me not above or below. If you nat great sound buy a sound system. I dont know many tvs outside of the $3000 bose tv that gives you great sound out of box. Well see how well it holds up but i already bougth a 4 year warranty from squaretrade for like $60 so if it lasts that long it was very worth it. I wouldn't spend tons on any current tvs anyway in 4 - 5 yrs 4K oled tvs will make these look like what old CRTs look like today so Id rather wait it out decision is yours.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 40 LCD
Reviews.Author: falkon215
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price,need to adjust the color and aspect ratio for awhile to get a good picture.Great color and 1080 with blu-ray was very clear and crisp,very suprised.Free shipping,undamaged from UPS gotta love it.Great looking bezel.USB worksbut poor alignment with bezel and metal plate.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Stanley R. Batt "BikeMan"
Reviews.Content: The picture is very good and the controls, remote, and connections are easy to operate.Sound quality from TV speakers is fair,  so I always send the sound to my receiver and external Bose speakers.

Reviews.Title: amazing color
Reviews.Author: Kirsten OConnor
Reviews.Content: works great fits our wall and wall unit perfectly, the color is amazing, does not have as many av connections as I would like but very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Hi-Def 40in. tv
Reviews.Author: Dally Brown
Reviews.Content: Very good color and very good hi-def,the wife and I enjoy watching the programs on it's a top grade tv.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: L. Fitzgerald "lb128f"
Reviews.Content: This Sceptre 40' HDTV has a great picture and sound. I read the online reviews prior to buying and they were helpful. But, I don't think the reviews I read gave enough "kudos" to what a great buy this is and how well it works! My son uses it for video games and watching TV and it's perfect!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Horrible Sound
Reviews.Author: SteveDave
Reviews.Content: The other reviews are 100% correct. The sound on this is absolutely atrocious. When I first turned it on, my girlfriend was in the other room and asked why my laptop speakers were so loud. If you purchase, make sure you have a sound system or soundbar handy ASAP. The documentation that comes with it is slightly strange (weird broken English wording even though the company is American). Otherwise, fantastic product that is a breeze to set up and use.Pros: Great price, great pictureCons: Sound, sound, and sound. USE A SOUND SYSTEM!

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Officer J.Bricker
Reviews.Content: pic qualit is great . holdin up so far. used it to replace a 64 in pioneer projection in bed room and the pic on x box smokes it

Reviews.Title: First LCD Flatscreen for me.
Reviews.Author: w cubed
Reviews.Content: Picture quality and reception fantastic. Set up couldn't be easier. Versus my old 32" tube tv, I'm seeing details like the individual leaves on trees in a far shot I never saw before  on old tv. Had the new tv month now. If it lasts as long as my old Sanyo (14 years), my new Sceptre will become a super value.

Reviews.Title: Only have good things to say!
Reviews.Author: LuckyMommie
Reviews.Content: Obviously, this isn't the best product of its kind. However, for the price I think it ranks very high. It arrived in perfect condition. No problem with packaging or delivery. It was easy to assemble the base to the tv and it even included its own tools to do so. The picture quality is great and the volume is good. I had never heard of this brand prior to the purchase, so I did a fair amount of online research and reading other customer reviews. For the price, it makes for a great tv. I don't use this as my primary television in the house, but it replaced an old tube television and serves its purpose. If you want to spend a grand or more on a really fine piece of equipment, you wouldn't probably be looking at this television to begin with at all. But if you are debating a less expensive television, I'd recommend this brand. I'd buy another when the need comes up in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: D. Scala
Reviews.Content: Good tv for the money. Used in basement for children's play area. Not the latest greatest technology and minimal features but real pleased with value of item

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ava Skye
Reviews.Content: Great sharp & sleek looking tv with a pretty great picture. Sound is pretty good as well so far no problems at all with this tv and meets my expectations,

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Beck
Reviews.Content: family is enjoying this television.  this is my second sceptre television that i have purchased.  nice and clear picture and reception

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Tiger W
Reviews.Content: Been using this TV for 3 weeks now. Great TV for the price. Sound is a whole lot better than some of the other "entry level" TV's. You do have to set the sound up using the equalizer. Use the "rock" preset setting. Good sound. Set up was quite easy. Only wish it had an alarm setting so the TV would come on at a particular set time. If the TV is mounted on the wall, an annoying "nub", (where the table stand mounts to) can not be removed from the TV (poor design). All-in-all not enough to knock it down a star rating. I'm truly NOT disappointed. Definitely would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: JUDAS TREES
Reviews.Content: After 2 weeks everything seems to be o.k.Easy to set up & colors are good.Has all the hookups I needed for the video systems and extra sound.My biggest complaints would be the remote isnt that easy to navigate,and the hd channel for playing dvds or video games has problems with the sound and video colors.But overall a good t.v. for the price.If anything changes within the next year,I will come back and upgrade my review.....

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Harvey Valles
Reviews.Content: PRODUCT IS EXCELLENT FOR THE PRICE!  THERE IS A FEW FLAWS WITHT THE SOUND, BUT AFTER ADJUSTING TO THE PROPER SETTING WAS ACCPETABLE.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Anthony Kickham
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for the price. The picture and sound is as good as ant other more expensive tv out there.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Kenny
Reviews.Content: A great tv for the price. The stand isn't all that sturdy, but most people hang it on the wall anyway. good picture and sound, great price

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and ease of use. I love the affordable price. The sound quality is okay not excellent but easy to work around by adding external speakers if more bass and 3d sound is needed. Its great for rooms and apartments because the sound doesn't travel or vibrate through the walls too much. The only thing is the stand(TV base) feels a bit wobbly. I love my the TV for being so budget friendly.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: clyde miller
Reviews.Content: Pros-Picture quality is great. Easy to setup and operate. Pulls in HD channels even when on basic cable which is a plus.Con-Wish it had an optical output for external audio such as soundbars.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, sound could be better
Reviews.Author: Robert Dold
Reviews.Content: Picture was very good for the price, audio could be better, not much bass but overall I would recommend for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Turgott
Reviews.Content: When I first received the package, I was a little skeptical about how it look. It's a $259 39 inch 1080p HD tv. Those don't come around A lot. However, when I opened the package I was very well pleased. The screen is absolutely gorgeous and everything came in the package. It even came with a screw driver which was a little surprising. The sound quality is pretty bad but luckily I already had a pair of 2.1 sound system speakers. The sound is a small price to pay for a tv this large with a quality this good. I recommend !

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: roberto s. rivera
Reviews.Content: great picture , vivid colors. excelent hdtv for the price , i recomended 100%. i have seen smilar produts ( brands ) no much difference

Reviews.Title: sceptre x408bv-fhd 39 inch tv
Reviews.Author: cornelius e. smyth jr
Reviews.Content: this was the best purchase i have in many years i bought three of these tvs and love it 5 stars for this product

Reviews.Title: Base for TV
Reviews.Author: BonBon
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves the tv.  I am kind of "iffy" about the base of the TV.  It does not appear to be very steady.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: gulfstorm
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV based on customer reviews  at Comp USA, Walmart, and Amazon. The price point I paid was a good value for this 39 " TV.  The only problem I had was a delivery date change from original posting on the web site. I called customer service which couldn't help but an e mail to Amazon did the trick. They delivered on time as originally posted.  I purchased an Apple TV to make a smart TV which enables me to see my iPad and iPhone screens and mirror stream to my Spectre TV. Will see how long it lasts oh could use a sound bar too.

Reviews.Title: Mother in law loves it
Reviews.Author: D. Wallner "Malabar"
Reviews.Content: It's obviously not the fanciest TV around by any means, but for the price it really cannot be beat.  The remote it comes with sucks, but if you have cable or satellite then you're most likely programming that remote to it anyways.  Lots of HDMI connection ports, good picture.  Speakers are ... ehhh, but like I said for the price you really can't beat it.  You're most likely not looking for theatre sound from an LCD set anyways so hook up the surround sound and enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Donna Schrieber
Reviews.Content: This tv was just what we needed for our son's room.  The picture quality is great.  We received itvery fast and it was packed well.

Reviews.Title: Buy it while you can
Reviews.Author: Showguy
Reviews.Content: Lets be honest you usually get what you pay for but in the case of this TV you can't beat the value. Picture is great considering its price and limited adjustments. Setup out of the box was near perfect. And yes the other reviewers are right, the sound does suck. As a secondary bedroom TV this is a great choice

Reviews.Title: Sceptre TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Shelton
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our bedroom.  Works very well in this room.  Clarity is very good and functions very well. Good Choices.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Decent Television
Reviews.Author: SV2331
Reviews.Content: I just moved into a new apartment and I needed a big tv for the living area. I didn't want to spend a lot of money so this is a great deal. The picture is good. The only issue I had with this TV is the sound quality. It has a bizarre tinny sound when the volume gets too high or there is ominous music playing. I tried to play around with the sound settings, but there was no change. But you can't really complain, 39-inch television for such a low price is a steal.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv for price
Reviews.Author: cool deal
Reviews.Content: purchasing this television for the price is worth it, I would highly reccommend purhasing this tv for the price.  One downfall to this tv is the direct tv was not able to program the remote to this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Big G
Reviews.Content: For the price, I can't complain.  We purchased two of these for use in our clinic.  I was so impressed with the value that I purchased six more for our other clinics. 2 months and no issues so far.The sound is a weak point. It is tolerable but lacks definition and you can't lower it enough for night time use.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I really like the features on this television.  It really doesn't get much use, but so far it seems to work fine.  I bought it on Black Friday weekend and it showed up the next day as promised.

Reviews.Title: Value for the Price
Reviews.Author: Spruance963
Reviews.Content: A decent 1080 TV for the Price. I would recommend to my friends looking for a no frills tv at a reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: great
Reviews.Content: I love this TV and the costomer service at scetre was great. Great color and Picture. Sound OK Easy manual to understand.

Reviews.Title: Great price and fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Kao P. Saechao
Reviews.Content: I got this on sale during black Friday for $248 plus tax(CA) with free shipping. My brother bought the same tv for the same price from Walmart.com during black Friday as well, but I got my tv first. The tv has excellent picture quality once I tuned it with THX calibrator. It is a great improvement over the default settings. I use it as a second tv for my PS3 and I gotta tell you, black ops 2 looks amazing on this tv. I will buy this tv again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Overall good for the money EXCEPT...
Reviews.Author: R. Wade
Reviews.Content: When our very nice Samsung TV broke down the repair quote was very high.  We started looking around for other TV options at a price we could afford to buy right away.  After going to the big box stores and frys we remembered to check out Amazon.com.  As a prime customer we knew we could get a TV in couple of days.  After a couple of hours of price comparisons and checking out reviews we found that this model TV had the best bang for the buck.  It has a great size plus 1080p HDTV for under $300.00.  I use to own Sceptre computer monitors years ago and never had any issues.  So we ordered this TV.  It arrived from the east coasts in 2 days!  matter of fact it arrived on Christmas eve!  Very nice.  It was easy to  put the stand on the TV.  the quality was pretty good for the price.  No artefacts but the color was rather bland and the blacks are OK. it doesn’t compare to our broken Samsung but that Samsung originally cost 4X as much.  so for the price the Sceptre is a great deal.HE IS OUR BIGGEST ISSUE:  The sound. there is no bass,  it sounds so bad that I thought our TV was broken. After a couple of weeks I caved in and called Amazon tech support who was super helpful.  After troubleshooting they recommended sending out a replacement. The replacement came within 2 days, but it also had no bass in the sound.  So now we are looking to buy a add on sound system for the TV.  You should keep this in mind if you are going to buy this model of TV.Pros:Great bang for the buck.1080P HDTV3 HDMIFast 2 day shipping (Prime)Cons:Sound has no bassColor is bland

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Peter David Daugherty
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome for the price it works great an the picture looks great! I bought it on Black Friday for my sisters family they love it they wouldn't shut up for a week about how much they an her kid love it an tell me constantly about all the complements they get from there friends about the picture

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is excellent but ....
Reviews.Author: spadata1
Reviews.Content: .... after a couple days of use, We quickly tired of the poor sound quality of the built in speakers so we ordered the basic Spectre Sound Bar to enhance the sound.  This soon turned into a nightmare of sound problems from total silence, sound volume flare ups, incompatible remote control interference (sound bar/tv/DTV).So far we simply removed the sound bar and connected my computer's 2.1 sound into the spectre TV headphone output for so far best result ... not exactly hi-fi but adequate.If I can ever get the TV - the SoundBar - and DTV working together I might raise my current rating (tech support was lacking in this case)

Reviews.Title: The picture is great.
Reviews.Author: David Moore
Reviews.Content: 1080p as described, but like most low end TV manufacturers the built-in speakers are garbage. Luckily this TV has a headphone jack, not a line 3.5mm line out, because I bought some Bose computer speakers that sit behind the TV. Since it's a headphone jack, the volume control comes from the TV. So I put the Bose speaker volume a little below half and just use the remote control for the TV to do the rest.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer 007
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV. I got a wall mount for it for about $20 and hung it on the wall in the living room. I am running the computer through it so that I can use it for both a computer monitor and a TV. I stream netflix through it. The picture is great. The sound is good. Not excellent, but I didn't expect it to be. I just use a jack splitter and add speakers. The USB ports are probably useful for pictures, but they don't support video, so you should take that into account if you wanted to play movies from an external drive, as I did. That doesn't work. Obviously you can get around this by running them through the computer instead.Most people are probably using this for it's intended purpose, as an actual TV. I think it works really well for that. Again, the picture is excellent. I can watch it from the kitchen 20 feet away and sideways and the picture is still perfect. No distortion at all.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: william j good
Reviews.Content: it has great picture once you ajust the the pic for youthe sound is greatand it is priced right

Reviews.Title: Decent picture, poor sound
Reviews.Author: InSaNiTy
Reviews.Content: The product has a good picture but rather lousy sound. I cant make out voices from the television over the sound of my treadmill only 2 feet away. This product also has no SPDIF audio output, just a standard 3.5mm headphone jack, which may make things a bit tougher if you're in the market for a decent sound bar.

Reviews.Title: sceptre
Reviews.Author: Tina Rice "TRL"
Reviews.Content: Has a nice picture, glad I got it.  My son hooked up speakers to it and it gives the picture a theater sound.

Reviews.Title: Great picture poor audio
Reviews.Author: Edward C. "Sailing Lubber"
Reviews.Content: As some other reviewers have noted this TV has a great picture but the audio is poor. With that in mind we installed it and connected it to the surround sound system. So I got a great price for a good picture and we now use our surround sound more often that we used to.

Reviews.Title: I dare you to beat it for the price
Reviews.Author: G. Powell "Gimme more PC!"
Reviews.Content: A week into it and love it!Box arrived in perfect condition & so was the TV. I have used every input and all work. NO dead/bad pixels.Although the internal tuner works just fine my main use is connected to my Win7 Media Center PC via HDMI and it just works.I will admit that the stand is quite wobbly but not really a "problem".I'm sure that you may find a better display out there but to me this looks great.

Reviews.Title: I am happy with my purchase.
Reviews.Author: Morris L. Brinkerhoff
Reviews.Content: Was a good price for this product. It's been working well and I very much like the larger picture size.

Reviews.Title: Got this for Christmas so far a great investment
Reviews.Author: C. Wilson "tired momma"
Reviews.Content: The picture is beautiful,crystal clear, the sound could be louder I think but we have the same problem with our new RCA tv as well. It was delivered safely and we were able to open the box and program the tv within a minute or two and it was ready to go. I was so happy to purchase this tv through amazon and getting an off brand which made me pretty nervous to begin with. My nephew also got a Scpetre tv in october and he brings it to our house to play his ps3 game -and I don't think he's had any problems either. So far I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: so far this has done everything it is supposed - for the first monthit was delivered promptly and has worked wellprice was a great value

Reviews.Title: oops gave the review for this accidentally for tv stand
Reviews.Author: Teresa Myers
Reviews.Content: tv is ok. picture is great, sound is not, but have surround sound system so not too bad now.  tv switches channels sometimes for no reason.  have to put it back on chan nel 4 and  then put back on high def.  but for the money, its ok.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: WJC
Reviews.Content: Bought on the Black Friday deals, Good for the off brand.Sound a little weak, Glad I had an Old Denon sound system for itGood pictureWould recommend to friend

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: CeeJae
Reviews.Content: I was very hesitant to order this TV because I have never heard of Sceptre. I am pleased with both the picture quality and the sound quality.  I hope the TV lasts for a long time, that part can't be reviewed yet, as I have only had it a few weeks.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV so far!
Reviews.Author: robocopcinci
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for our bedroom. Great deal for 39". Picture is awesome. Lot of people have mentioned issues with sound. But I don't see any problem. I keep it very low and still can hear well. This is a very good 2nd TV for the price and quality.

Reviews.Title: One Great deal, One great Performer for the price!
Reviews.Author: Auswak "In USA"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV Black Friday 2012.Delivered quickly, great picture and very easy setupSound is better than expected and quite acceptableThis TV was a great addition to the Family room ready for Christmas

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Tv123
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. However, I bought two of these TV's and the stand did not align with the TV. I had to take the stand apart and adjust the screw for it to align. A quick fix though.

Reviews.Title: Great picture but poor sound
Reviews.Author: Chris S
Reviews.Content: PRO: Easy setup, great pictureCONs: Speakers are very poor (has a head phone jack so I picked up a 2.1 computer speaker system which sounds great), startup splash banner of "SCEPTRE".

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: After months of research, I finally chose this TV based on reviews and the price. I had originally been looking for a smaller tv due to limited budget but I decided it was worth the extra $100 to get a larger screen. The shipping was a disaster but that is neither here nor there since this is a product review.Easy to set up, it literally took me less than ten minutes to plug everything in and get the screen going. The part that took the longest was waiting for my cable provider and TV to get on the same page to sync up. I've had this TV for a month now and I have absolutely no complaints. In regards to other reviews about the sound level, it is a bit on the low side in comparison to other TVs. It's not a big issue though because my living room is not large and it's usually just me and the roommate watching. Speakers would be an easy fix if it ever bothers me enough but I doubt it will be an issue. Other than that, everything else has worked perfectly and let's hope it continues to!

Reviews.Title: Great for price!
Reviews.Author: Drew Smith
Reviews.Content: Picture is great except the speakers are really low quality. Need to buy speaker system to make the sound quality better.

Reviews.Title: Its worth what you pay, not too bad.
Reviews.Author: matthew hale
Reviews.Content: Got it as a black Friday deal. Not a ton of menu options, so color and overscan adjustment are not really there. It won't auto hold inputs either, so hooking up a laptop has to be done everytime you turn it on. Its worth its cost, but you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: The deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Tim Ferry
Reviews.Content: Nice. The low power setting picture is acceptable. The only picture problem I have seen is when the local weatherman has a green screen behind him showing a night scene, the black has white specks in the black.Other wise the blacks are fine. I have another no name 32 inch 720p (Olevia) TV and this green screen speckling does not occur.Over all I would say Sceptre 40 inch was well worth it for the month I've had it

Reviews.Title: like it very much
Reviews.Author: mohan zaver
Reviews.Content: i like its price and resolution on tv too.  my family been enjoing watching it very much. better than haider tv.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a good TV
Reviews.Author: dinsy53
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome TV for the price I paid (under $250).  I only gave it 4 stars, deducting 1 star for its HD picture.  It is very good, but it doesn't compare to our Sharp 60".  The giftee is very happy with his gift, so I think that counts for a star in and of itself.  It was easy to put together the stand, and easy to hook up to our existing boxes and equipment - that's another star.  I'm giving two stars for the price, I haven't even found anything close to this price in this category of TV or the quality of it.  Hope this helps for the next purchaser!!

Reviews.Title: I bought another one
